Reviews.Title: Good package !
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: This bundle package is very value. You saved a mount of money !This package inclued:- Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP- DigPro 16GB High Speed Card- Digpro Deluxe Case -> this case is not the case in the picture. this case is very bad- Deluxe Cleaning Kit- Spare Battery** I also bought more battery and memory card with this package.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0065MMKTG/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B0065MMKTG&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dmtungrau-20http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007M54E08/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B007M54E08&linkCode;=as2&tag;=dmtungrau-20

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Mira
Reviews.Content: This camera has an amazing zoom, I love it! on the other hand it doesnt perform that good in bad light, and flash is not automatic, you have to open it manually.If you're buying this camear make sure to buy extra battery it runs out pretty fast!I still didnt try out all the options nor studied the manual options, but it seems to be quite enough of them. this set is great except for the bag which is of very low quality, but it is still great for the given price, you get a sd card and battery at a price of the camera itself at bestbuy shop!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: We actually put off replacing our previous camera for quite a while because we were unsure of what to replace it with.  We were looking for a camera that was easy to operate and that could do really good close up shots for our ebay business.  Well, happily we found both with this Canon Power Shot SX170. The camera is pretty intuitive and the on screen menu's are easy to follow. The only thing I took one star away for is that in order to get the pictures on to your computer, you need to pull out the memory card and plug it in. There may be a transfer cable or cord that you can purchase that will allow you to do this, but it doesn't come with the kit. Other than that, it's a great camera and we're very pleased with our purchase!

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Richard B. Porter
Reviews.Content: Better photos than expected!  Bought for my grandaughter and she loves it.  She particularyLikes the delay selection on the shutter function.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Vesta Kingston
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting to replace my old camera and this is the perfect one for the job. I have enjoyed it immensely.

Reviews.Title: My daughter camera
Reviews.Author: Sara May
Reviews.Content: We love how well it zooms in and  how well it still comes out clear from a far distance. I could not recommend any better camera or brand because this one is so good for us.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Daniel Kirk
Reviews.Content: My last two camera were Canon and they do a great job and a nice picture, would buy again, hope this helps

Reviews.Title: Not Up To Cost Standards
Reviews.Author: ZANE E. HEITSCHE
Reviews.Content: For the price that was paid for it, it wss very cheap looking and didn't seem to take pictures all that well. All the accessories appeared to be in miniature, totally not what was expected.

Reviews.Title: The Power Shot SX170 IS is another winner from Canon!
Reviews.Author: Book Lover in NE LA
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera.  I have to say, though, when I ordered it, I didn't notice that the necessary cable to upload pics from camera to my computer isn't included in this package, so be sure to order one if you don't already have one.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is not good
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Kumar
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera anf thought that it would be a good camera with 16x zoom but picture quality is not good as expected from canon in it's range.

Reviews.Title: It’s very good
Reviews.Author: osama
Reviews.Content: Hello dear,I received my order, it is very good like what i want and i like it. I'll buy more thing form you in the future.thank you for help my.Best regards

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
16x Optical Zoom
28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
720p HD video in stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video (Black) Premiere Bundle With DigPro 16GB High Speed Card , Digpro Deluxe Case, Deluxe Cleaning Kit ,Spare Battery
